description:
Easy, reliable PDF creation from all applications.


- fixed a bug that caused some TrueType fonts to be displayed with incorrect characters
- hovering the mouse over a clickable link now shows a finger cursor
- dragging files onto the pdfFactory Pro desktop shortcut now works correctly
- fixed a bug that caused some text output to be obscured by black rectangles
- (Pro only) fixed a crash that happened when all the text in a text note was deleted
